thread.title: Google confirms rolling out the mobile intrusive interstitials penalty yesterday
thread.title_full: Google confirms rolling out the mobile intrusive interstitials penalty yesterday

author: Barry Schwartz
title: Google confirms rolling out the mobile intrusive interstitials penalty yesterday
text:
Google said the mobile intrusive interstitial penalty went live yesterday but webmasters have not claimed any issues yet. The post Google confirms rolling out the mobile intrusive interstitials penalty yesterday appeared first on Search Engine Land.

Please visit Search Engine Land for the full article.
